name: Mailartery
author: mailartery

sections.description:
This plugin will add the functionality of the newsletter subscription on your WordPress website. You can get the list of emails of your subscriber and also can export it into the CSV file.

Use this [mailartery_newsletter] shortcode on the WordPress page.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

short_description: Use this plugin to get the newsletter subscriber list in your WordPress website.
description:
This plugin will add the functionality of the newsletter subscription on your WordPress website. You can get the list of emails of your subscriber and also can export it into the CSV file.
